Class GridBagLayoutInfo

java.lang.Object
java.awt.GridBagLayoutInfo
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public final class GridBagLayoutInfo extends Object implements Serializable
The GridBagLayoutInfo is an utility class for GridBagLayout layout manager. It stores align, size and baseline parameters for every component within a container.
Since:
1.6

  • GridBagConstraints
